description: Conduct an atmosphere-only simulation for 1980–2022 using ESA CCI forcing for SST and sea-ice (daily, 0.05 degree, updated through 2023 currently)  References: Roberts, M. J., Reed, K. A., Bao, Q., Barsugli, J. J., Camargo, S. J., Caron, L. P., … & Zhao, M. (2025). High-Resolution Model Intercomparison Project Phase 2 (HighResMIP2) towards CMIP7. Geoscientific Model Development, 18, 1307–1332  [High-Resolution Model Intercomparison Project Phase 2 (HighResMIP2) towards CMIP7.pdf](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/19392615/High-Resolution.Model.Intercomparison.Project.Phase.2.HighResMIP2.towards.CMIP7.pdf)  Webpage: https://highresmip.org/experiments/experiment_cmip7/
label: highresSST-present
